actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Public Works..

official_title: A bill to amend the Disaster Relief Act of 1970 for the purpose of making clear that disaster assistance is available to those communities affected by extraordinary shoreline erosion damage.

summary.text: Provides, under the Disaster Relief Act of 1970, that disaster assistance be made available to those communities affected by extraordinary shoreline erosion damage.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Disaster Relief Act of 1970 for the purpose of making clear that disaster assistance is available to those communities affected by extraordinary shoreline erosion damage.
